Sean Warner

SVP Commercial Australasia

Sean is SVP Commercial Australasia UMA, and an experienced Regional Managing Director with a demonstrated history and proven success working in the music, media and entertainment industries in senior roles at BMG, Sony PlayStation, Foxtel and for the past 14 years, Universal Music. His experience in Digital Transformation and Change Management has seen UMA emerge as the clear market leader in ANZ and with a lifelong passion for music, he has had the privilege to work alongside some of our most iconic global and local artists.
